column8: Dark current has been compensated for by the instrument (ON/OFF)
Further specification of a particular campaign. Mainly used where a SPECCHIO campaign comprises several original sampling campaigns
Publication to be cited when using these spectral data
SOP 13 Measuring a Large Tree Plot
Notes produced by the data ingestion module during data loading into SPECCHIO
Designates this spectrum as dark current spectrum
Designates this spectrum is garbage. This flag can be used to automatically exclude garbage spectra from processing.
Channel designation for multi-channel instruments, e.g. irradiance and reflected radiance channels
Investigator of these data; fallback if not definable via existing SPECCHIO users
Description of processing algorithm applied to spectrum
Name of processing module applied to spectrum
Publication relevant to these spectral data
Information on where data originated from before being stored in the file loaded to SPECCHIO.
Date when the original sample was collected in the field.
Picture showing the general sampling environment, i.e. vicinity of the target
File that provided the original data (applies if data were processed outside of SPECCHIO)
Notes produced by the SPECCHIO time shift routine
Time since last dark current measurement
Description of white reference panel name
